main event: On August 8, 1954, a factory worker in Bad Hersfeld, Germany photographed a dome-topped saucer with landing gears above the factory.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 4 minutes, The object was described as having changing shapes including round and oblong, The observer indicated a 60-degree elevation and 120-160 degree azimuth, The report includes handwritten notes regarding potential aircraft, The document originates from Project Blue Book, which was established by the United States Air Force to investigate UFOs.
